title: Kamistyles E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce application with complete shopping and payment experience. Built product management system handling 200+ products with advanced search, filtering, and sorting capabilities. Integrated Stripe and Paystack payment processing with webhook handlers for automated order confirmation. Optimized for performance with server-side rendering achieving 95+ Lighthouse score.

title: Drive Clone â€“ Cloud Storage System
description: Personal cloud storage application with secure file management and sharing. Engineered RESTful API for file operations including upload, download, organization, and deletion. Implemented JWT-based authentication and role-based access control with Supabase. Designed PostgreSQL schema with hierarchical folder structure and optimized queries for fast retrieval.

title: Content Management System
description: Production CMS with hierarchical article management and workflow. Implemented self-referential database relationships for parent-child article hierarchy. Created collapsible tree navigation with authentication and status workflow management (draft/published/archived). Added auto-save functionality and dark mode with localStorage persistence.

title: Kamisoft SaaS Platform
description: Architected SaaS platform with microservices backend achieving 99.9% uptime. Optimized database schemas reducing query response times by 40%. Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment. Configured serverless functions for event-driven workflows and background processing tasks.
